alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Leslie; Owsley; Perry (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 5:57PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Owsley, north central Leslie, northern Perry and southwestern Breathitt Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 556 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Valjean, or 12 miles southeast of Booneville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Dalesburg, Morris Fork and Saul around 600 PM EDT. Buckhorn, Buckhorn Lake S.P., Crockettsville, Shoal, Talbert and Sebastian`s Branch around 605 PM EDT. Gays Creek, Bush Branch, Altro, Beech, Wolf Coal, Confluence, Mosley Bend and Canoe around 610 PM EDT. Barwick, Lamont, Chavies, Krypton, Whick, Little, Saldee, Copland and Howard Creek around 615 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Hazard, Ned, Watts, Clayhole, Flintville, Lost Creek, Rowdy, Dice, Hardshell, Bulan, Ary and Noble. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
